Projects I have worked on

Over the years I have worked on many cool projects. Check them out!

CPSC 110 Handin

Problem set submission service for CPSC 110 (Computation, Programs, and Programming).

Sidler International

Modern website with information about company products and inventory information.

Angela Huo Real Estate

Real estate website designed to showcase the latest properties on the market.

Personal Portfolio

Personal portfolio to showcase past work.

BitFit

Problem set submission service for CPSC 110 (Computation, Programs, and Programming).

AirBC

Website for fictional airline, AirBC, that allows customers to book tickets and staff to edit associated data including aircraft status, routes, and flights.

insigntUBC

Web app to search for courses and rooms at UBC with given criteria, and schedule courses into available rooms.

Ignite Fitness

Android and iOS app along with marketing website for Ignite Fitness, a fitness plan program.

Robotix Education

Online store for robots targeting the K-12 market.

Mind the Gap

Android app for London Underground to display routes and closest stations.

CHEM 3615 Online

Online pre-lab software for BCIT CHEM 3615.
